lines.text: You realize we'll lose every friend we have?
A small price to pay for giving the world a great work of literature.
Galahad, I appeal to your better nature!
Does this pig mean more to you than your nephew's future?

[to his prize pig, the Empress]
We'll have you back in your boudoir before bedtime, you adorable girl!
Do I not speak English, or are you all bonking mad?
